dict.string: This is used for biometric authentication
This is used for uploading photos
Our app uses the disk space API to store user-generated content, such as images and videos, locally on the device. This allows users to access their content even when they're offline.

Our app uses the file timestamp API to track the last modified date of user-generated files. This information is used to display the most recent files to the user and to sync changes across multiple devices.
Our app uses the user defaults API to store user preferences and app settings. This allows users to customize their experience and helps the app remember user choices between sessions.

Our app uses the active keyboards API to detect when a user switches between different input methods. This information is used to provide a seamless user experience by adapting the app's interface to the currently active keyboard.
